RelatedSentence: ( WSAZ ) -- Four Greenbrier County residents were indicted by a federal grand jury in connection with heroin trafficking , according to information from U.S. Attorney Booth Goowin 's office .
Osborne and Arbogast face hearings this week to determine whether they will remain in Marshals Service custody .
